lines.text: Checks, or it's a saving throw, so whatever your constitution saving throw is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that finish your go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, you're up. Caleb, you're on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So, before Caduceus' next turn, they're going to get a go, and Beauregard's going to get a go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that real Jester or fake Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can cast spells from my fake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will-- just because I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, is your duplicate concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Much easier to keep track of which one the real Jester is because with the Spiritual Guardians up, the duplicate is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could eventually run over here, too, and then--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's uphill, so it'll be difficult.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will-- just because I like this rope so much, I'm going to hang on it with my knees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, who's holding the rope up here, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you holding the rope up there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm staying up at the top, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, I'm going to hang on it with my knees like that, upside down, and shooting the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that we're battling all these things and still, like, I'm-- (grunts) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold it steady, guys! And you know what, I will throw a knife instead of the thingy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll throw it at the one closest to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there? Go for it. Roll for the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 18 plus stuff, so it's got to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You can go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it is sneak attack because you had advantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. (counting) 25 plus six is 31, plus I will pump an extra 3d6 into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dagger plummets, then slides down the bottom of the floor--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On bonus action, I'll charge with my Flaming Sphere at the other one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the Flaming Sphere-- does it catch the USB cord on fire, or am I okay?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will in a couple rounds.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I raise the cat's cradle up, and I spin my finger around and wrap it up tighter in string and bring it right back down and cast at 5th-level, and I will send one of the snakes to the final brazier and hit every last creature on the map because there's four of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That one alights, and then roll damage for the other.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the last brazier lights, (whooshes) the doors behind you and Jester (whooshes)--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you both to make dexterity saving throws for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you do have dex saves.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Remember that scene in the Titanic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I fail, I'll succeed it with the ring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I use the Ring of Evasion.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there any way I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both barely manage to move to the sides.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I'm holding onto the rope, so I'm assuming (laughs) Fjord probably gets yanked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just clench your glutes and hold the rope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both manage to prevent just falling into the next chamber.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move if you'd like to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will move just maybe five or 10 more feet to the left, so I don't fall in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. That brings us to Fjord. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, like when you go tubing, you can kind of aim where you want to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and, like, jump and slide, so I'll slide right towards where Caduceus is?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I will try and kaplinko my way down to Caduceus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To get right where Caduceus is, you will be passing by Veth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've also dropped the rope, I assume?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth, make a dexterity check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A dexterity saving throw. I would say with disadvantage because you weren't expecting it, but you have an advantage, so it's just a straight roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've still got the rope on the other end!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, but she's now just gliding off like this because you're holding one end of the rope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So are you holding on to-- she holds onto the rope, so you go falling out the side, but are you still holding the rope?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you're not going to hold onto it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You let go of the rope?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was never holding the rope. My legs were on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right. Then, I'll tell you what: as you and the rope go sliding by, roll a d20 for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I know. Can we try to catch her?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or grab her on the way down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can't give you guys 16 different reactions, and when it's, like, three rolls have failed in a row here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (like Sean Connery) Indiana, let it go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Veth just slides into the next chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I catch my knife on the way? (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to you in a second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fjord, what are you doing? You trying to scoot this way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm trying to slide right down to where Caduceus is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But I will allow advantage on this because you are doing this intentionally, and it's just sliding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you add your dexterity bonus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage. Everything should-- Well, but, like, we have advantage on a ton of stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, where you want to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will either bowl through Caduceus, or you can try and stop or go with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hit him, and when I hit him, I'm going to cast Thunder Step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty! You do enter the frost radius of two of them when you do so, so you do take 14 points of cold damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You both go about to tumble as you finish the spell, and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The flaming sphere, I will say at this point because it's no longer in your sight, will dissipate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So where do you two want to go?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to go to the corner, down over here, right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hurts. That shoulder's going to be sore in the morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage do both of them take, and what's their save?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 21-- 21, 24, 24 points of thunder damage, and it's a constitution 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you in the chamber have to protect yourself as you're suddenly pelted with tiny bits of broken ice, and with that quiet moment, you realize that nothing else in the chamber beyond you seems to be moving, reacting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would I have hit you also?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is within five feet, so yes, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You slid just down with Caduceus and bamfed out when you were out of close range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think that's right, 'cause it was 24?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we should get into the next room and take a minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You slide into darkness, and where you are expecting a floor to meet you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you to make-- just roll a d6 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't really see much around you because you don't have darkvision-- but you have the goggles on still, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do. I will at some point cast Feather Fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've fallen for 70 feet at this point, and looking around you, all you see is bits of jagged ice and stone-- (whooshing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you just slowly begin to drift for 80, 90, 100, 10, 120, 150, 200 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At about 270 feet, you begin to just barely see, rising up to you, the floor of this pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Debris and elements of fallen architecture just litter the floor at the bottom of this pit, and you land on your feet gently, taking no damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If that had been literally anyone else--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as that rope went, I was, like, okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Can I even hear them? That's far! Yeah, I can still hear them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I start sending the globules down just to get an idea of the space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of it, all of whatever structure was there has fallen into this pit into endless darkness, and as you hear the faint echoes of Veth calling up to you, we're going to take a break.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to hit you with a Cure Wounds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do a-- if we can take 10 minutes, I can also heal, give everybody who took damage a little bit of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, we'll wait for that, after the break.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord is the master of the drive-by Thunder Step.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, like, the hottest use of that spell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Heads up, heads up, heads up, heads up! (impact) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So see you guys in a minute!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back! Wow, you all, you all came in hot on that, all right! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as you all now glance into this floorless room around the rubble, all you see now below you is the endless expanse of dark, dark pit below.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There are no sorts of stairs working its way around in this shaft of darkness?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not that you can see, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if this is the way or what, but--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you-- are you alone down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But, I mean, that's what you see at that glance around you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look over the bodies real quick, see if I recognize them or if they're fresh, or anything like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They look like they've been frozen and broken here for a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I will set about making my way through the spikes and trying to find some sort of wall or exit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make another investigation check for me, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know why I rolled twice, but the one that I would count is a natural one, but with all sorts of things, it becomes 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do pick up a weird acerbic smell in the air that wasn't there previously.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: -- my alchemical knowledge, do I pick up any-- is it acidic or any, or, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ASHLEY'S TABLET: -- scientists were able to-- (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you do, after a moment of searching, following the smell, find what you think is the source of that scent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance in this one section, and there is, like, an oily, tar-like substance that is between a couple of these broken slab elements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like, a slick oil tar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurping) It shoots out and begins to wrap around you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, you're fucking by yourself!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's with a black pudding or something, oh!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's the black-- oh no! That's not good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought it was, like, a goo!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You survived a fall, and you--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do I got-- I'm trying to find a way out!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In such a teeny, tiny little room all alone, Veth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't even short rest or nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we-- did we hear her scream?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You hear the scream. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First, we shall see, as it does get an ambush round on you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got all these people up here. Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still an ability check, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe it does work for that, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so. Wait, what? My initiative just says plus five.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) Everything I thought I believed. All bets are off now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the fuck is wrong with us? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a dexterity check. It is an ability check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But a dexterity check, I don't get Reliable Talent on dexterity checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does your Reliable Talent affect?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you not been doing this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whenever you make an ability check, oh, that lets you add your proficiency bonus, so no, you're right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am the best at D&D.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It rolled higher, but it's pretty-- it has a really high negative.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As far as I can get.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: God, it's like something out of The Hobbit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just in the bottom of this area, like, "Fuck, fuck!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what it is. Can it see? Does it need to see? I don't know, who knows! I take out a pocket full of buttons, and I throw them and cast Hypnotic Pattern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it need to see? Does it need to have intelligence? I don't know. We'll find out!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's pretty fair in the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I like the idea of a pocketful of buttons. That's cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. So it is currently charmed and incapacitated.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (to "Pocketful of Sunshine") ♪ I got a, I got a pocketful of buttons ♪ (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's coming apart at the seams.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One of the heat shields cracked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We are a mentally broken crew tonight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, when you're not around people and then you get around people--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (falsetto) ♪ Oh, I got a pocketful of buttons ♪

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you watch as it begins to emerge. (squelches) You finish, you throw the buttons, and the buttons (whooshing) flash in the air above it in a multicolor spray as it reacts-- (gurgles) It just holds its position there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay, I will call up: Um, guys! (screams) I'm being attacked by a black ooze of some sort! (yells) Maybe-- should I just come up, or are you coming down?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, you should come up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But what if this is the way out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now the black ooze's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no, you got to get out of there! You got to get out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Go home and get your shine box."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 15, 20, it does manage to just get in range towards you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, wait. I have an idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the plus that gets you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the plus that gets you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can Uncanny Dodge that, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah, so you take eight points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In that it can change its appearance--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but it is magical armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It resists the acidic effects of its pseudopod and does not diminish, so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So the 16 points are negated or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a concentration check for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you maintain concentration on your pattern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to go-- is it somewhere you can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, you can just pick a direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So you would have to guess how far down it is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could throw a torch down there. (laughs) That's a way to do it. Somebody else could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somebody else, so I can Dimension Door down really fast?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, we'd have to wait for the torch to land, but no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can see-- we can see-- Caleb has lights down in the tunnel, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, he put down his globules, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I sent them down already, so they-- they're some distance in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range on that spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's like, it's over 100 feet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It wouldn't have made it all the way down, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it can get less than halfway down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't want us to engage? You're okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, do you want us to jump in the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, you guys are all staying up there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She just said not to come down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the round. Veth, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snaps fingers) Cast Spider Climb and start running up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pull up the Driftglobe and light it up in that moment of panic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cast Spider Climb, which means the charm goes away.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the Driftglobe? Does it have a further range?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if these things can go up the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That puts you at your full movement at 35 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hope they can't move faster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And wraps around you with itself-- (mini clatters) -- as you fall and die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It doesn't even take its action to get 40 feet up the wall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay, okay, okay, we should help now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yells) Remember when I said I was fine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not holding you, but it's now filling the space around you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so who's doing what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to Dimension Door us down as much as I can see because he cast Daylight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you need a light to get down there before we do this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I shove the Driftglobe into Fjord's hand and turn into a giant eagle, (whooshes) and I grab Caduceus and Fjord and start flying down the passage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just want to stay up here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I grab Yasha by the neck, yep, and Fjord.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what, I'll be fine. It's okay, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think my giant eagle mini is at the old table.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I will, right before Jester grabs me, I'm going to take out a celebone, and I'm going to crack it, and I'm going to throw the celebone down there at the end so that she can see as we go down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a rave torch at the bottom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay, it will fall, and by the end of the round, the full distance to go there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you're holding a cantaloupe that's glowing Daylight 60 feet in every direction, in your hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how much farther it is after that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, both of you (whooshes) reappear (whooshes) and fall an additional 20 feet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do like what I've done before and, like, brace Jester on top of me and take the blow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you manage to fall, you manage to kick off the wall, and what it does is instead, Slow Fall reduces the damage to you to little, but you don't take all of her damage away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you just reduce her damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But I pad her a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, so you take five points of bludgeoning damage from the impact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, now you can do something!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, am I there? Can I go, am I there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hate to be a rules lawyer, but she doesn't have her goggles, and there's no light down there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I threw down the celebone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, she threw the celebone down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So it's a rave down there right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, actually, well, it would've been your action to crack it and throw it down before you went, so that's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just look up, and I wait for the LED stick to fall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, and you watch as it, boom, and as soon as that happens, you look over, and you see these two giant black masses, (slurping) up the wall, and one of them turns around and goes, like, and begins to move back in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, that would be so creepy!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It flashes in different colors every time it goes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, I need you both to roll initiative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you got, what was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm aware that it's faster than me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are they faster than you? (laughs)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to run up the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to run up 35 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you dart past, it's going to go ahead and swing out with its pseudopod. (whooshes) That is a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you take five points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'll Uncanny Dodge that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make another concentration check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, oh, concentration on Spider Climb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hit you as you left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you do fall 30 feet, right into the other slime, sploosh! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like that would negate some fall damage there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's got to, right? He just collapses?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not a big air cushion like for stunt guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, I will say because you are impacting full-body into an acidic entity--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's now (squelching) around you, starting to block your vision.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, how did I get here? (laughter) This is not going well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Rapidly makes an air cavity that immediately poofs it out? (whooshing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) He's shoving Play-Doh back into the tube.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you are prone, it has advantage in the attack roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that is going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, if you are prone-- let me double check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still a solid, not a liquid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can still take your reaction, technically, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I already took a reaction.

lines.text: Like, pull-- is it cloth? What is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You tug at one point and you see something move, like an arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you are right now? I'd say, roughly, 50 or so feet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll use Divine Sense, just in case.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to keep an eye behind us for a second.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any celestial, fiend, or undead within 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking back, nothing seems to be following.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll scoot up to it, and see if it's a trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get a glance at the pile here, and there are bodies, multiple bodies, lying in different positions, leaned against the wall and slumped over, some that are just face down on the ground, others looking upward, limbs just akimbo.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Any sign of death? I mean, cause of death?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you can go ahead and inspect, if you want to make a medicine check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are his ears and mouth bleeding?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So this is Kryn in history.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The same group of the guy that was frozen up top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two drow, a human, a goblin, and two orcs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A human, a goblin, and two orcs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Makes sense for a party from the Dynasty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six bodies total, one more body if we count the guy upstairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, just, like, one, two, three, four...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is not The Sun Tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, no, no, I just, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That red thread's looking real hard to snag onto something. (laughs)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A mix of stab and slash wounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I be able to tell with a medicine check--? Oh no, you just rolled a medicine check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much blood is out versus how much would have been in these people? Like, is this the normal amount of blood? I mean, or does it seem--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This isn't a Nightmare on Elm Street scene.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure, but like, is there less then there should be, I suppose? I feel like I might know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the same day, so I can't do See Invisibility.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there an end to chamber that's behind them, at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A total of, you know, 11, 12, at its height, and it's just a long hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do the bodies look deliberately piled? Or like something happened?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, is it a skirmish? I'll assist, because I want to know if it's a skirmish.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or did they get Tetsuoed in the hallway?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or if they were just dropped there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They had weapons ready, they were armed for combat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were an adventuring party, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have no idea what their purpose was here, but they're all left here dead from this scuffle.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're thinking Molly's working with the Dynasty in some way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I think they ambushed a Dynasty group that was already--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- slash wounds and stab wounds? Is that what you said?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We all ready knew that the Dynasty was trying for the same thing that DeRogna was.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Picked clean like the other bodies have been, or because it seems like liquid blood, not as picked over?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you go ahead and check through the bodies, and other than their weapons that have been left at the side, and their ruined armor, most anything of worth has been picked clean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fungus begins to take hold rather rapidly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have anything that might help against mental or psychic dam-- damage?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Other than-- I can do it for a minute at a time, but I can't do anything else.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And this hallway that extends, the same sort of dual beacons of light, just into the distance?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How far-- Does it extend quite a distance until visual acuity gives out, or does it seem like--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: it has-- in the next four or five sets from where you are, it seems to stop.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did all these other guys get through without fighting those oozes? (laughs)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Also, didn't you have to chop through, like, a big thing of ice to get here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They probably put the ice there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was obscuring it, it wasn't actually blocked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just went to town on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, it looked like it had been a week, so maybe it was formed--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do any of the bodies that we've seen, any of them look even remotely familiar, or just random?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking over them, no, not really.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And are they all just drow, or various Dynasty folk?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, right, we answered this question.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Veth, do you want to take point?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do have a Locate Creature, when it comes time for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do, and I'll also say, did you-- just in case, do you have a Word of Recall? Just in case?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, so that's the spell I'm not going to use, unless a bunch of people are already dead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, does anyone with magic have anything that can help us against psychic damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just curious after encountering two corpses with blood coming out of their eyes, and horrible expressions on their faces.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But these guys are tore up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: M-moll-- Lucien, we're assuming, killed Vess DeRogna by himself?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, if they are of the same order this Nine Eyes Order, maybe they know each other's weaknesses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If they died the same way, because Lucien can just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give them a vision, or overwhelm their brains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How are we supposed to compete against that? He killed a member of the Cerberus Assembly by himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't prepare Word of Recall because Vess said that teleporting in these areas would be really, really dangerous, so I thought that would be a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a thing I might be able to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Figured teleporting out is easier than teleporting in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take the point again, and keep going down the same hallway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we be checking the hallways for hidden doors, and just normal shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just run your sword along the sides as we go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just run your fingers along the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take one side, you take the other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there any sort of etching or pattern in the way Beauregard encountered?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But as opposed to just seeing the one at the bottom, the entirety of the interior is just one massive network of arcane script.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the arcane script mean anything? Does it say anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, I pull out one of my last two pearls, all that's left is the black one, and place it to my own head, and take a moment to cast a little dunamancy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: it requires something to complete the connection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, it's a little slot, about six inches tall and about a foot wide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six inches high, and about a foot wide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In the middle of the iron door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No blood, dried blood on the ground, on the door, anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around here, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Doesn't appear to be any signs of dried blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So it requires something to complete it, but we don't know if that's something like blood, or magic? but we don't know if that's something like blood, or magic? Like, it could be magic?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the root of the glyph? Do we understand the root of the glyph?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Protection, a ward, keeping us out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, it's just been one continuous long, straight hallway.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing's pinged your emergency wire, either?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, yeah, it would have mentally dinged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bodies had all their arms, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or, at least, all their arms were present.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there dust on the ground, or anything like that? Can we see, like, footprints and stuff that isn't ours on the ground, at all?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to really tell, I'd say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to go back for one of those bodies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have an arm with a tattoo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's try one of the normal ones first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, let's try something else first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a head that you chopped off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I also thought of that, but I just didn't want to take time to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Vess DeRogna's body has the tattoos on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So let's just grab a person.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go back for a body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which of the corpses do you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two orcs, two drow, a goblin, and a human.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Any of them have tattoos on their arm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing that seems to be in line with what you were referring to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we'll bring the corpse there, and we'll experiment with a hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you still have Molly's vial of blood?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we end up getting that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we do, we have Molly's blood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All the vials are less then they were when you gave them, but you do have some.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything else that's indicative around it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope, it's just looks like an iron door surrounding it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you think it needs to be something with Abjuration? Like, the symbols indicate Abjuration?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if they have the symbol on their wrist, one of the Nine Eyes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I have Armor of Agathys, which is ice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all the contents (whooshing) fill the bottom of the middle of this hallway, including the body of DeRogna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab her underneath her armpits, and drag her over to this thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And take her hand, and stick it in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Try it this way. That's where the tattoo is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just didn't know, like, if you're checking a passport, you know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six inches tall, a foot wide, and about a foot in depth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it means it is a protective spell, not that protective spells open it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I'll cast Armor of Agathys on myself at 1st-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, like, standing at the door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, do you have to direct it into the hole?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Probably got to put your hand in and dump.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do it at level one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Surrounds me, manifesting as a spectral frost that covers me and my gear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Stick your hand in there while you do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you could just do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I put my hand in and cast Armor of Agathys at 1st-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, does it have somatic components on it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does it say under components, like, V&S?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you put your hand in there, and you do the manipulation of your fingers, the spell begins to apparate, but then the energy (whooshes) vanishes inside the slot, and you see a faint blue glow from the inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About, maybe, a sixth of the full equation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) You have to do a spell of every type.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about the dome? Maybe it's just--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's all Abjuration? Do we see any other type of glyphs, or?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said that was one out of...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say one out of six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A sixth of it is now glowing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, maybe it's a level thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's level one, as well, to see if it adds or...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go ahead and put your hand in there, and release the Shield, once again the Shield is about to apparate, and the magic (whoosh) shoots inside, and you glance inside, and another sixth of it, about a third of the interior is now glowing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was that the same? Was that also--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have lots of Shield, so I will do another two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will do that twice more.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two thirds of it are now glowing, with this same process repeating itself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, just so that I do not empty out--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, Caduceus, do you have anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't even know how to figure out what I have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got-- Protection from Energy is-- but I've used up--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've only got one 3rd-level spell left, and if we need that for Revivify, I'm--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have another first level spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can keep doing it, if we need me to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're sure nothing else will work, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I can do it. I have first level spells.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I never use my lower slots anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, the first time you cast Shield at second level--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It fills up the rest of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second level slot was what was required.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now with all six spell slots sacrificed, it glows blue, and the door (rumbling) opens before you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I was about to say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the door opens before you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The figure then looks over, through the entrance to the hallway, right towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you've been sitting on that one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take off my cloak, lay it over-- (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a cat in a cat box, just shh, shh, shh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How big did you say the room is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room would be about 45 to 50 foot from end to end, and it is a circular chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're going to have a great--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, I forgot. I used up all my middle spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah, right? Right, we had talky talkies, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's going to be great. It's going to be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a thing I can do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's okay, that's okay, that's okay, that's okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They just boom-boom-boom-boom lit up red.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, you just saw this black silhouette with the blue light from overhead, in shadow from the body it was holding, and then suddenly you see all these red light sources light up around the body, and the person in its hand just goes limp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And it was Molly, plus one, with four other figures? And they had wiped out whoever was in there? Copy that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These eyes that appeared on the body, were they on the body, they just started to glow, or did they, like, get burned into the body? We don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, it was Molly's body that was glowing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll pick up from there, it'll be fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Why'd you have to touch the damn oozes? We could of had all these spells available.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Honestly, it wasn't until the shouting up through the tunnel that the oozes were like, "Oh." (laughter) (groaning)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, we could have just been quiet, gone through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth has a lot of benefits in certain spaces.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that spider? Was that spider alive. Was it just a statue? What was the spider?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would have actually lead to a door to a balcony overlooking the same scene.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, we'll pick up from there next week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We love you very much, and is it Thursday yet?
